spells.sanitizedDescription: Ruptures the ground at target location, popping enemy units into the air, dealing damage and slowing them.
spells.description: Ruptures the ground at target location, popping enemy units into the air, dealing damage and slowing them.
spells.name: Rupture
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Ruptures the ground at target location. Enemies caught in the rupture are launched into the air for 1 second, take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, and are slowed by 60% for 1.5 seconds.
spells.tooltip: Ruptures the ground at target location. Enemies caught in the rupture are launched into the air for 1 second, take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, and are slowed by 60% for 1.5 seconds.

spells.sanitizedDescription: Cho'Gath unleashes a terrible scream at enemies in a cone, dealing magic damage and Silencing enemies for a few seconds.
spells.description: Cho'Gath unleashes a terrible scream at enemies in a cone, dealing magic damage and Silencing enemies for a few seconds.
spells.name: Feral Scream
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Silences enemies in a cone for {{ e2 }} second(s) and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.
spells.tooltip: Silences enemies in a cone for {{ e2 }} second(s) and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.sanitizedDescription: Cho'Gath's attacks passively release deadly spikes, dealing damage to all enemy units in front of him.
spells.description: Cho'Gath's attacks passively release deadly spikes, dealing damage to all enemy units in front of him.
spells.name: Vorpal Spikes
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Toggle: Basic attacks launch spikes that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Spikes grow wider as Cho'Gath gains Feast stacks.
spells.tooltip: Toggle: Basic attacks launch spikes that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Spikes grow wider as Cho'Gath gains Feast stacks.

spells.sanitizedDescription: Devours an enemy unit, dealing a high amount of true damage. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath grows, gaining maximum Health (maximum 6 stacks). Cho'Gath loses half of his stacks upon death.
spells.description: Devours an enemy unit, dealing a high amount of true damage. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath grows, gaining maximum Health (maximum 6 stacks). Cho'Gath loses half of his stacks upon death.
spells.name: Feast
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Hungrily devours an enemy dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) true damage to Champions, or 1000 (+{{ a1 }}) true damage to minions and monsters. If the enemy is killed by Feast, Cho'Gath grows, gaining {{ e3 }} maximum Health (maximum 6 stacks). Loses half of his stacks on death.
spells.tooltip:
Hungrily devours an enemy dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) true damage to Champions, or 1000 (+{{ a1 }}) true damage to minions and monsters.

If the enemy is killed by Feast, Cho'Gath grows, gaining {{ e3 }} maximum Health (maximum 6 stacks). Loses half of his stacks on death.
